channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024120778
item.description:
Report X-2024120778

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-12
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered during sort operations. No Release. The plastic jerrican is marked with a warning label: Combustible, Harmful fatal if swallowed Harmful Vapors...". MFG Label on the jerrican: Laticrete Stonetech Impregnator Pro- Sealer, 5 Gallons, Advanced Stain Protection, Solvent Based, Natural Look Penetrating Sealer (Granit, Marble, Slate, Travertine, Limestone, Grout). The order information on the package lists the Product Details: Laticrete Stonetech Impregnator Pro- Sealer ST317-0105, 5 Gallons, Advanced Stain Protection, Solvent Based. SDS Search: UN 3265 Hydrocarbons, Liquid, n.o.s. Class 3 Packing Group: III Shipment is being held for FAA investigation.
